title: Morgan Wallen accidentally hits baseball legend's wife with bat during concert entrance
description: Country singer Morgan Wallen accidentally hit Jose Bautista's wife with a bat during a pre-concert stunt at Rogers Centre in Toronto over the weekend.
content:
Morgan Wallen threw a curveball during his ritual pre-concert walkout over the weekend in Canada.
